sentences.sentence: Only 6 cases of pyogenic spondylitis following vertebroplasty or kyphoplasty have been reported, and their causes remained unclear.

sentences.sentence: Objective To study effects and other related problems of surgery for patients with cervical spine fracture and ankylosing spondylitis.
